original_text: Our parents were unfaithful; they did evil in the eyes of the Lord our God and forsook him. They turned their faces away from the Lord’s dwelling place and turned their backs on him.
korean_text: 우리 조상들이 범죄하여 우리 하나님 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 하나님을 버리고 얼굴을 돌려 여호와의 성소를 등지고

sentences.original_text: they did evil in the eyes of the Lord our God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리 주 하나님의 보시기에 악을 행했으며

sentences.original_text: They turned their faces away from the Lord's dwelling place
and turned their backs on him.
